hero.name: Mahamadou Gremah
hero.description: Ni ɗalibi ne ɗan Najar mai sha'awar kimiyyar kwamfuta. A halin yanzu ina cikin shekara ta 2 a karatun kimiyya da fasaha ɓangaren injiniyan yanar gizo da tsaron bayanai a Faculty of Sciences of Monastir a Tunisiya. Wanda ya kafa GremahTech, kamfani ne na farako wanda ya ƙware a haɓaka manhajar yanar gizo da wayar hannu a garin Damagaram.
